title: Adding a measure of patient frailty to Medicare payment model could lead to fairer reimbursement for clinicians
description: Researchers identified a way to measure frailty using patients' medical claims that more accurately predicts costs-of-care, especially for clinicians with disproportionate shares of frail patients. Adding this measure to Medicare's value-based payment models …
